parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.56</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Eden Editor </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Execute a block of code in which all Eden Editor operations will be recorded as one history step. For example creating an entity, setting its attributes and then connections would normally be recorded as three different steps. Calling them all within single '''collect3DENHistory''' block will group them together and the user will need to undo only once to revert the changes. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''collect3DENHistory''' code </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> code: [[Code]]  </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[collect3DENHistory]] {
	_logic = [[create3DENEntity]] ["Logic", "Logic", [[position]] [[player]]];
	[[add3DENConnection]] ["Sync", [_logic], [[player]] ];
};</code>
Creates a logic and connects it to player in one history step.
</value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value> 
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> 
[[add3DENConnection]]
[[create3DENComposition]]
[[create3DENEntity]]
[[delete3DENEntities]]
[[do3DENAction]]
[[remove3DENConnection]]
[[set3DENAttributes]]
[[set3DENObjectType]]
 </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value> 
</value></part><part><name index="7"/><value>  </value></part><part><name>MPBEHAVIOUR</name>=<value> 
____________________________________________________________________________________________
</value></part></template>

<comment><!-- CONTINUE Notes -->
</comment><dl class="command_description">
<dd class="notedate">Posted on October 26, 2020 - 01:15 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:7erra|7erra]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
Contrary to other code block structures ([[call]], [[if]]/[[then]]/[[exitWith]], [[switch]]/[[case]]/[[default]], etc.) the code block of [[collect3DENHistory]] will not return any value:
<code>_unit <template><title>=</title></template> [[collect3DENHistory]] {
	[[create3DENEntity]] ["Object", "C_Protagonist_VR_F", [[screenToWorld]] [0.5, 0.5]];
};
_unit <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value><null></value></part></template></code>
</dd>
</dl>
<comment><!-- DISCONTINUE Notes --></comment></root>
